item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Lining Panels and Floor Panels

remarks.para: May be damaged or missing provided procedures are established and used to ensure associated compartment remains empty.

numlitem.para: Ensure the Load Supervisor or authorized personnel has signed the load manifest. This signature indicates that the load planning system has accounted for any aircraft load restriction resulting from the inoperative equipment and that the aircraft has been loaded in accordance with all UPS weight and balance limitations.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "_______ panels missing in ______ lower cargo compartment" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: When forward cargo compartment is to be voided, ensure all contents are removed from the PFM Box. Include the statement "PFM Box verified empty" in the deferral statement.
